languages.text: "Сестра Арджента сияет подобно путеводной звезде, наделяя окружающих необъяснимой решительностью. Однако я вижу, как за ее спиной клубится темная, уродливая мгла, столь явно оттеняющая ее сияние. Она тяготит Сестру битвы, тянет вниз... Но едва ли Арджента сама это замечает".

traits.locale_text: "Сестра Арджента сияет подобно путеводной звезде, наделяя оружающих необъяснимой решительностью. Однако я вижу, как за ее спиной клубится темная, уродливая мгла, столь явно оттеняющая ее сияние. Она тяготит сестру битвы, тянет вниз... Но едва ли Арджента сама это замечает".

languages.text: "Sister Argenta shines like a guiding star, inspiring resolve in those around her, seemingly inexplicably. However, I see a dark and ugly fog billow behind her, contrasting sharply with her shining light. It burdens the Sister of Battle. It drags her down... Yet Argenta herself is hardly aware of it."
languages.original_text: "Сестра Арджента сияет подобно путеводной звезде, наделяя окружающих необъяснимой решительностью. Однако я вижу, как за ее спиной клубится темная, уродливая мгла, столь явно оттеняющая ее сияние. Она тяготит Сестру битвы, тянет вниз... Но едва ли Арджента сама это замечает".

traits.locale_text: "Sister Argenta shines like a guiding star, inspiring resolve in those around her, seemingly inexplicably. However, I see a dark and ugly fog billow behind her back, contrasting sharply with her shining light. It burdens the Sister of Battle. It drags her down... Yet Argenta herself is hardly aware of it."

However, I see a dark and ugly fog billow behind her, contrasting sharply with her shining light. It burdens the Sister of Battle. It drags her down... Yet Argenta herself is hardly aware of it."

"Sister Argenta shines like a guiding star, inspiring resolve in those around her, seemingly inexplicably. However, I see a dark and ugly fog billow behind her, contrasting sharply with her shining light. It burdens the Sister of Battle. It drags her down... Yet Argenta herself is hardly aware of it."

languages.text: “阿洁塔修女就像一颗引路的星星。不知为什么，她可以激发周围所有人的决心。然而，我却看到她身后跟着一团阴暗、丑恶的雾霾，与她明亮的光芒形成了鲜明的对比。这团阴霾为战斗修女带来了负担，拖累着她……但阿洁塔本人却几乎完全没意识到这件事情。”
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta shines like a guiding star, inspiring resolve in those around her, seemingly inexplicably. However, I see a dark and ugly fog billow behind her, contrasting sharply with her shining light. It burdens the Sister of Battle. It drags her down... Yet Argenta herself is hardly aware of it."

traits.locale_text: “阿洁塔修女就像一颗引路的星星。不知为什么，她可以激发周围所有人的决心。然而，我却看到她身后跟着一团阴暗、丑恶的雾霾，与她明亮的光芒形成了鲜明的对比。这团阴霾为战斗修女带来了负担，拖累着她……但阿洁塔本人却几乎完全没意识到这件事情。”

languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta shines like a guiding star, inspiring resolve in those around her, seemingly inexplicably. However, I see a dark and ugly fog billow behind her, contrasting sharply with her shining light. It burdens the Sister of Battle. It drags her down... Yet Argenta herself is hardly aware of it."

languages.text: «La hermana Argenta brilla como una estrella guía, inspirando determinación en quienes la rodean de forma aparentemente inexplicable. Sin embargo, en contraste con su resplandeciente luz, también veo una niebla oscura y fea detrás de ella. Es una carga para la Hermana de Batalla que la lastra... sin que la propia Argenta sea consciente de ella».
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta shines like a guiding star, inspiring resolve in those around her, seemingly inexplicably. However, I see a dark and ugly fog billow behind her, contrasting sharply with her shining light. It burdens the Sister of Battle. It drags her down... Yet Argenta herself is hardly aware of it."

traits.locale_text: «La hermana Argenta brilla como una estrella guía, inspirando determinación en quienes la rodean de forma aparentemente inexplicable. Sin embargo, en contraste con su resplandeciente luz, también veo una niebla oscura y fea detrás de ella. Es una carga para la Hermana de Batalla que la lastra... sin que la propia Argenta sea consciente de ella».

languages.text: 「シスター・アルジェンタは導きの星のように輝き、周囲の人々に決意を鼓舞しているように見えます。ですが、彼女の背後には、暗く醜い霧が立ち込めています。それは、彼女の輝く光とは対照的です。それはシスター・オブ・バトルに重荷を負わせる。彼女の足を引っ張るものです…しかし、アルジェンタ自身は、それにほとんど気づいていません」
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta shines like a guiding star, inspiring resolve in those around her, seemingly inexplicably. However, I see a dark and ugly fog billow behind her, contrasting sharply with her shining light. It burdens the Sister of Battle. It drags her down... Yet Argenta herself is hardly aware of it."

traits.locale_text: 「シスター・アルジェンタは導きの星のように輝き、周囲の人々に決意を鼓舞しているように見えます。ですが、彼女の背後には、暗く醜い霧が立ち込めています。それは、彼女の輝く光とは対照的です。それはシスター・オブ・バトルに重荷を負わせる。彼女の足を引っ張るものです…しかし、アルジェンタ自身は、それにほとんど気づいていません」

languages.text: "Schwester Argenta strahlt wie ein Leitstern und lässt auf unerklärliche Weise in anderen Entschlossenheit erblühen. Ich sehe jedoch einen dunklen, hässlichen Nebel hinter ihr wabern, der im scharfen Kontrast zu ihrem strahlenden Licht steht. Er belastet die Schwester der Schlacht. Er zieht sie hinunter ... Doch Argenta selbst nimmt ihn kaum wahr."
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta shines like a guiding star, inspiring resolve in those around her, seemingly inexplicably. However, I see a dark and ugly fog billow behind her, contrasting sharply with her shining light. It burdens the Sister of Battle. It drags her down... Yet Argenta herself is hardly aware of it."

traits.locale_text: "Schwester Argenta strahlt wie ein Leitstern und lässt auf unerklärliche Weise in anderen Entschlossenheit erblühen. Ich sehe jedoch einen dunklen, hässlichen Nebel hinter ihr wabern, der im scharfen Kontrast zu ihrem strahlenden Licht steht. Er belastet die Schwester der Schlacht. Er zieht sie hinunter ... Doch Argenta selbst nimmt ihn kaum wahr."

languages.text: « Sœur Argenta brille de mille feux telle une étoile et insuffle à ceux qui l'entourent une détermination sans faille, sans que personne ne puisse expliquer pourquoi ni comment. Néanmoins, cette lumière est menacée par un brouillard sombre et inquiétant qui la suit sans relâche. Il représente un fardeau pour la Sœur de Bataille. Un lourd fardeau... Mais Argenta elle-même n'en est pas consciente. »
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta shines like a guiding star, inspiring resolve in those around her, seemingly inexplicably. However, I see a dark and ugly fog billow behind her, contrasting sharply with her shining light. It burdens the Sister of Battle. It drags her down... Yet Argenta herself is hardly aware of it."

traits.locale_text: « Sœur Argenta brille de mille feux telle une étoile et insuffle à ceux qui l'entourent une détermination sans faille, sans que personne ne puisse expliquer pourquoi ni comment. Néanmoins, cette lumière est menacée par un brouillard sombre et inquiétant qui la suit sans relâche. Il représente un fardeau pour la Sœur de Bataille. Un lourd fardeau... Mais Argenta elle-même n'en est pas consciente. »

languages.text: "Açıklamak zor olsa da Rahibe Argenta, yol gösteren bir yıldız misali parlaya parlaya çevresindekilere azim veriyor. Ne var ki kendisinin ardında karanlık ve mide bulandıran bir sisin çöktüğünü görebiliyorum. Bu sis, içindeki parlak ışıkla büyük bir tezat oluşturuyor. Harp Rahibesi'nin sırtında ağır bir yük var... Argenta, bu yükün onu sürüklediği durumun farkında bile değil."
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta shines like a guiding star, inspiring resolve in those around her, seemingly inexplicably. However, I see a dark and ugly fog billow behind her, contrasting sharply with her shining light. It burdens the Sister of Battle. It drags her down... Yet Argenta herself is hardly aware of it."

traits.locale_text: "Açıklamak zor olsa da Rahibe Argenta, yol gösteren bir yıldız misali parlaya parlaya çevresindekilere azim veriyor. Ne var ki Argenta'nın ardında karanlık ve mide bulandıran bir sis çöktüğünü görebiliyorum; içindeki parlak ışıkla büyük bir tezat oluşturuyor. Harp Rahibesi'in sırtında ağır bir yük var... Argenta, bu yükün onu sürüklediği durumun farkında bile değil."
